articles.description: Major Radhika Sen, a peacekeeper who served with the United Nations peacekeeping mission in the Democratic Republic of Congo, was pursuing a career in biotechnology before she joined the Indian Army.
articles.content:
Major Sen graduated as a biotech engineer.
